instruction: Analyze the ESG ratings of daily consumer goods, energy, raw materials, and non-daily consumer goods industries in the Asia-Pacific region, particularly in countries with high ESG risks.
output: Understood, I will focus on analyzing the ESG ratings of the mentioned industries in the Asia-Pacific region, with special attention to countries with high ESG risks such as South Korea, India, and mainland China. I will provide a comprehensive report on their ESG performance.
